long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ahoy, fellow e-book lovers and literary explorers! KNDL Kraken PDF Unleashed is the perfect mate for your Kindle e-book conversion journey. Our user-friendly extension lets you transform Kindle e-books and web pages into easily manageable PDFs, ready for all your reading, annotating, and research needs. Set sail with KNDL Kraken and dive into a sea of opportunities!

Note! You need to be logged in with a User Profile with an email in Chrome for this extension to work.

Free version allows you to generate 25 PDFs a month each with a maximum of 25 pages.

Lite, Pro and Business subscriptions are coming soon and include higher limits.

If you have any problems with specific web pages, please reach out and let us know what the page was and what problem you experienced!

* Main Features: *

‚öì Smooth Conversion: Turn your Kindle e-books or web pages into high-quality PDFs with a single click, preserving the original formatting and layout.

üìö Device Flexibility: Enjoy your e-books on various devices and platforms using your favorite PDF tools, perfect for authors, students, researchers, and book reviewers alike.

üîç Annotate and Research: Once your e-books are in PDF format, use your preferred PDF software to annotate, highlight, and take notes, making research and studying a breeze.

üåä Custom Previews: Create PDFs in different screen sizes simulating various devices to ensure e-books and web pages look great everywhere!

üîê Privacy-Focused: We value your privacy - our extension doesn't show ads, sell your information, or partake in any shady business practices.

Join KNDL Kraken PDF Unleashed and embark on an unforgettable voyage through the web and your Kindle e-book collection. Chart your course to literary discovery today! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è

Known issues (which will be fixed in future updates):
* Some web pages with nested scrolling cannot be captured properly.
* Closing the popup or navigating away during capturing will stop the PDF generation.
